sentences.en: At the same time, shoppers are becoming highly receptive to new technology.
sentences.cn: 同时, 顾客开始变得更乐于接受新技术.

sentences.en: But It'seems likely that courts will usually be receptive to more functional arguments as well.
sentences.cn: 但法院似乎也有可能像通常那样,易于接受较为功能主义的理由.

sentences.en: Do you think that there is any receptive audience for his remarks.
sentences.cn: 你觉得有人愿意接受他的言论吗？

sentences.en: He grew eloquent under her receptive gaze.
sentences.cn: 遇到了她这种乐于接受的目光使他变得口若悬河起来.

sentences.en: He is not very receptive to my suggestions.
I was to keep ever before them the picture of a bright, passive , good - humored, receptive mass.
sentences.cn: 我准备在他们面前把群众描绘成一群乐天派, 温顺善良, 任人摆布.

sentences.en: She began to find a receptive audience for her work.
sentences.cn: 她开始为作品寻找知音。

sentences.en: She was always receptive to new ideas.
sentences.cn: 她总是愿意接受新观点。

sentences.en: The atmosphere within the school was by then receptive to change.
sentences.cn: 直到那个时候,学校的环境还是容易接受改变的.

sentences.en: The style is elongated , ending in a small, capitate stigma, which becomes receptive at bloom.
sentences.cn: 长柱延伸, 其末端有一小的头状柱头, 开花时接受花粉.

sentences.en: The voters had seemed receptive to his ideas.
sentences.cn: 选民看上去很愿意接受他的想法。

sentences.en: They should thus be receptive to the views of artists.
sentences.cn: 这方面,不能不多听艺术家的意见.

sentences.en: We found beings among you who are receptive to our beaming.
sentences.cn: 我们发现人类在你们中间谁是接受我们的微笑.

sentences.en: When Cowperwood next came to Mckenty's house the latter was in a receptive frame of mind.
sentences.cn: 等柯帕乌二次来麦克凯提家里的时候,麦克凯提心里已经愿意接受了.

sentences.en: When it came to gossip Gillanbone was as receptive as a wire to an electrical current.
sentences.cn: 此事一旦传开,吉兰本就会象电线接上电流一样马上将它传遍大街小巷.

sentences.en: You might find them in a more receptive mood tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 也许他们明天会更乐于接受意见。

words.tran_cn: 被一般承认的；被认为标准的
接待；接收；招待会；感受；反应
接受能力；[生理] 感受性
[生化] 受体；接受器；感觉器官
收到；接受；迎接（receive的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 善于接受的，能容纳的，有接受力的，感受的，感官的
trans.tran_en: willing to consider new ideas or listen to someone else’s opinions
